entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:04 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow this afternoon. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
